author: Ndi Mncadi
text: Asking for a friend*

author: Ndi Mncadi
text:
Guys if a company you were previously working for pays you extra, and they ask you to reverse the extra amount , would you do it? 

Mind you, they are repeating this mistake for the second time, you refunded them the first time. 🫥😬

author: Ndi Mncadi
text: I wholeheartedly want this man to leave me alone….ngi right ngaye yoh

author: Ndi Mncadi
text: It’s like a cycle. I can’t explain it but kuba njalo nje. Yoh the pain is unmatched. I truly think we should visit my dad, that made us feel so much better last time

author: Ndi Mncadi
text: Can’t wait to visit my dad’s grave, that was so therapeutic for all of us, the tears went away for abit, now we back to square 1. We literally take turns in crying EVERYDAY!!!! If my brother feels down today, he is definitely crying throughout the day, next day it’ll be my sister

author: Ndi Mncadi
text: My class begins in 10mins, i suddenly cant wait because I’m avoiding someone who just popped by at home unexpectedly

author: Ndi Mncadi
text: When i got my employment offer, i cried so much, till today i still cry because my dad’s not here to celebrate with me. Yoh ayi lento yokushonelwa umzali sucks, you can’t even celebrate your achievements because umzali akekho https://t.co/piJwd3Gsx2

author: Ndi Mncadi
text: My friend recently got a fuel card at work. The benefits there are crazy!!! Love this for her 🤌🏾🥹❤️

author: Ndi Mncadi
text: Got home and my mom’s cooking, playing songs zabo no Baba. She misses her husband every single second 💔
